inclusion.criterion: pituitary GH adenomas confirmed by surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: active acromegalic patients although treated with surgery,radiation therapy and somatostatin analogs
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients with poor control of hypertension(SBP>150mmHg or DBP>95mmHg
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 41-year-old man with Acromegaly, underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. Lab studies show IGF-1 level of 4.5 ULN adjusted by sex and age.
